TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterExpression extends System.Linq.Expressions.Expression

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Parameter%2A> factory method to create a ParameterExpression.
The value of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property of a ParameterExpression object is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType>.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> object that prints the value of a ParameterExpression object by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Parameter%2A> method.
[!CODE [System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#49](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10#49)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression Accept(class System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor visitor) cil managed

Docs.param: The visitor to visit this node with.
Docs.summary: Dispatches to the specific visit method for this node type. For example, <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression"> calls the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall%2A>.
Docs.returns: The result of visiting this node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This default implementation for <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType> nodes calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>. Override this method to call into a more specific method on a derived visitor class of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor> class. However, it should still support unknown visitors by calling <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.

Docs.summary: Indicates that this `ParameterExpression` is to be treated as a `ByRef` parameter.
Docs.value: True if this `ParameterExpression` is a `ByRef` parameter, otherwise false.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the parameter or variable.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType NodeType { get; }

Docs.summary: Returns the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression">.
Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"> represents.
Docs.value: The Type that represents the static type of the expression.
